data.description:
# Some call it a workout, we call it a game.

Connect your rower, bike or elliptical to your Meta Quest, or try our bodyweight exercises (boxing, skiing, squats, and more), and start your fitness journey through our HOLOworlds. 

# Save 40% with HOLOFIT Annual Subscription! 

Risk-free with a 7-day free trial! 

{3125288950941565}

# ü™ê 15+ virtual worlds 

Paris, Antarctica, Cyberpunk World, Tropical, Aurvangar, Underwater, and more 

{1535793016972995}

# üëü 6 workout modes
 
Guided HIIT, Fat burn programs, Performance, Race mode, and more 

{834202505294468}

# ‚≠êÔ∏è Monthly & daily challenges 

A community-wide workout adventure through the HOLOuniverse

# ü•á Companion app 

Measure calorie burn, and save your workout data in our Android/iOS companion app. Integrates with Apple Health, Google Fit, and Strava. 

# üéâ Monthly updates 

Regular updates with new features, upgrades, and more

--

üéÅ Check out the **free demo** or start your **7-day free trial** to try the full HOLOFIT experience risk-free. Manage your subscription in the Meta Quest mobile app. 

HOLOFIT works with **any rowing machine** out of the box, and **any bicycle or elliptical with an additional cadence sensor**. Or you can use it **without any fitness machines, in our Freestyle mode for various no-equipment bodyweight exercises**.

Bluetooth connectivity may not work on some devices. For any questions, please contact support@holodia.com
